routines: regular visits to ski areas and resorts

They appreciate the thrill of snowboarding and enjoy spending time in lively settings like coffee shops and restaurants. With a strong educational background, they likely have a college degree and a stable career, placing them comfortably in the middle socioeconomic status. Their frequent check-ins at POIs like ski areas, resorts, and coffee shops suggest they enjoy a lifestyle enriched by both leisure and social interactions. User 191 often travels, indicating they have an adventurous spirit and an openness to experience new places. Future visits may include similar ski resorts (POI IDs: 4782, 488) and coffee shops (POI IDs: 382, 667), highlighting a pattern of enjoying familiar comforts in active settings.
